title: Phase 10 – Intelligent Routing, Agent Autonomy, UX Governance
description: Advance autonomous task routing, integrate dynamic UX governance, and embed inter-agent coordination heuristics using learned patterns.
objectives: Implement dynamic agent task routing engine
Model autonomy boundaries using agent-state heuristics
Integrate UX-based behavioral triggers for agent actions
Enable feedback-governed decision protocols across agents
next_steps: Align planner with autonomy boundaries per agent
